name: edgelink
description: EdgeLink - URL Shortener with Smart Routing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd edgelink/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:backend: cd edgelink/backend && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.prod.toml --env production
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd edgelink/frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy .next --project-name=edgelink-production

author: EdgeLink Team
